body.p: Smart update State Structure is used to maintain the wearleveling algorithm related smart/health information. Memory for this structure is statically allocated as smart_update_state_t.

fig.title: Smart Update State Structure

plentry.pd: State of smart update state structure.
If set to '1', then the available spare space has fallen below the threshold.
If set to '1', then the device reliability has been degraded due to significant media related errors or any internal error that degrades device reliability.
If set to '1', then the media has been placed in read-only mode.
Percentage of reserved space for spare.
Percentage of available spare threshold for event.
Opaque tag information from the request message.
Used by the advanced IPC Network API for message queuing.
